long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover detailed insights for any website you're browsing with the Sensor Tower - Website Stats Chrome extension. Whether you're curious about user engagement or the brands advertising on a site, this tool puts the data right at your fingertips.

✦ Features:

📊 Website Traffic Stats: See how many users are active on the website, average time spent, and more.
💼 Advertiser Insights: Find out which brands are advertising on the website.
🖱️ One-Click Access: Simply click the extension icon while visiting any website to instantly view statistics and advertisers.
📈 Intuitive Dashboard: Easy-to-use, with a clean design that helps you quickly understand the data.

Ideal for digital marketers, researchers, and anyone curious about how websites perform and who advertises on them.

✦ Why Choose Sensor Tower - Website Stats:

🔍 Boost your research: Uncover how well websites are performing in terms of traffic and discover key advertising partners.
📈 Optimize your marketing strategies: Use advertiser data to plan outreach or collaborations.
📲 Stay informed: Get interesting statistics without leaving the website you're visiting.


Download now and take the guesswork out of website insights!
